verses.text: And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w determined|strong="H0559"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for his \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*.

And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* told \w out|strong="H5608"\w* threescore and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* to bear \w burdens|strong="H5449"\w*, and \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* to \w hew|strong="H2672"\w* in the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* to \w oversee|strong="H5329"\w* them.

¶ And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Huram|strong="H2361"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, As thou didst \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* with \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and didst \w send|strong="H7971"\w* him \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* him an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein, \add even so deal with me\add*.\f + \fr 2.3 \ft Huram: or, Hiram\f*

Behold, I \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* to the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w dedicate|strong="H6942"\w* \add it\add* to him, \add and\add* to \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him \w sweet|strong="H5561"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*, and for the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* \w shewbread|strong="H4635"\w*, and for the burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* and \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, on the \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, and on the new \w moons|strong="H2320"\w*, and on the solemn \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. This \add is an ordinance\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* to \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.  +  r 2.4  t sweet…: Heb. incense of spices *

And the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* which I \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \add is\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*: for \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \add is\add* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* above all \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

But who is \w able|strong="H6113"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* him an \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, seeing the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* of \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* cannot \w contain|strong="H3557"\w* him? who \add am\add* I then, that I should \w build|strong="H1129"\w* him an \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, save \w only|strong="H0518"\w* to burn \w sacrifice|strong="H6999"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him?\f + \fr 2.6 \ft is able: Heb. hath retained, or, obtained strength\f*

\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* me now therefore a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w cunning|strong="H2450"\w* to \w work|strong="H6213"\w* in \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and in \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and in \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, and in \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, and in \w purple|strong="H0710"\w*, and \w crimson|strong="H3758"\w*, and \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and that can \w skill|strong="H3045"\w* to \w grave|strong="H6605"\w* with the cunning \w men|strong="H2450"\w* that \add are\add* with me in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, whom \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* did \w provide|strong="H3559"\w*.\f + \fr 2.7 \ft to grave: Heb. to grave gravings\f*

\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* me also \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, fir \w trees|strong="H1265"\w*, and algum \w trees|strong="H0418"\w*, out of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*: for I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* can \w skill|strong="H3045"\w* to \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* in \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*; and, behold, my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \add shall be\add* with thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*,\f + \fr 2.8 \ft algum: also called, almuggim\f*

Even to \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* me \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*: for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* which I am about to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \add shall be\add* \w wonderful|strong="H6381"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*.\f + \fr 2.9 \ft wonderful…: Heb. great and wonderful\f*

And, behold, I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* to thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, the \w hewers|strong="H2404"\w* that \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w timber|strong="H6086"\w*, \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w measures|strong="H3734"\w* of \w beaten|strong="H4347"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w*, and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w measures|strong="H3734"\w* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*, and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w baths|strong="H1324"\w* of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w baths|strong="H1324"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.

¶ Then \w Huram|strong="H2361"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* in \w writing|strong="H3791"\w*, which he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, Because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w loved|strong="H0160"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, he hath \w made|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over them.

\w Huram|strong="H2361"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* moreover, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, who hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* a \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w endued|strong="H3045"\w* with \w prudence|strong="H7922"\w* and \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*, that might \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for his \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*.  +  r 2.12  t endued…: Heb. knowing prudence and understanding *

And now I have \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* a \w cunning|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w endued|strong="H3045"\w* with \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*, of \w Huram|strong="H2361"\w* my \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w*,

The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* of the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, and his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \add was\add* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Tyre|strong="H6876"\w*, \w skilful|strong="H3045"\w* to \w work|strong="H6213"\w* in \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and in \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, in \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, in \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, in \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, and in \w timber|strong="H6086"\w*, in \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, in \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and in fine \w linen|strong="H0948"\w*, and in \w crimson|strong="H3758"\w*; also to \w grave|strong="H6605"\w* any manner of \w graving|strong="H6603"\w*, and to find \w out|strong="H2803"\w* every \w device|strong="H4284"\w* which shall be \w put|strong="H5414"\w* to him, with thy cunning \w men|strong="H2450"\w*, and with the cunning \w men|strong="H2450"\w* of my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

Now therefore the \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w*, and the \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*, the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, which my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H0559"\w* of, let him \w send|strong="H7971"\w* unto his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*:

And we will \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* out of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, as much as thou shalt \w need|strong="H6878"\w*: and we will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* it to thee in \w floats|strong="H7513"\w* by \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* to \w Joppa|strong="H3305"\w*; and thou shalt carry it \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 2.16 \ft as much…: Heb according to all thy need\f*\f + \fr 2.16 \ft Joppa: Heb. Japho\f*

¶ And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w numbered|strong="H5608"\w* all the \w strangers|strong="H0582"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w numbering|strong="H5610"\w* wherewith \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* had \w numbered|strong="H5608"\w* them; and they were \w found|strong="H4672"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.\f + \fr 2.17 \ft the strangers: Heb. the men the strangers\f*

And he \w set|strong="H6213"\w* threescore and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* of them \add to be\add* bearers of \w burdens|strong="H5449"\w*, and \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add to be\add* \w hewers|strong="H2672"\w* in the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w overseers|strong="H5329"\w* to \w set|strong="H5647"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* a \w work|strong="H5647"\w*.
